title: Bringing AI on-chain
description:
Ethereum serves as a settlement layer for trust. It presents itself as a great option to offer trust-as-a-service for AI agents, which are normally oriented for individual profit and non-collaborative.

To best leverage Ethereum as a building block for AI agents, we want to give a workshop focused around collaboration between agents which will focus on interacting with Prediction Markets, a particular application we at Gnosis AI believe has lots of potential.
